com.grzm.pqconninfo.alpha

Class UnixContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.grzm.pqconninfo.alpha.BaseContext
      • com.grzm.pqconninfo.alpha.UnixContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Context

    public class UnixContext
extends BaseContext
    Unix (or rather, non-Windows) specific Context implementation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UnixContext(EnvVars envReader)
      Constructor for a Unix system Context, given an EnvVars instance.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String getConfigSysconfdir()
      Returns the value of the sysconfdir provided by the pg_config tool.
      InputStream getConfigSysconfdirServiceFileInputStream()
      Returns the input stream of the contents of the service file in the sysconfdir specified by pg_config.
      String getConfigSysconfdirServiceFilename()
      Returns the input stream of the contents of the service file in the sysconfdir specified by pg_config.
      String getenv(String var)
      Fetches the value of the given environment variable from the context.
      InputStream getUserPassfileInputStream()
      Returns the input stream of the contents of the per-user passfile.
      InputStream getUserServiceFileInputStream()
      Returns an input stream of the contents of the per-user service file.
      String getUserServiceFilename()
      Returns the name of the per-user service file.

      • getUserServiceFileInputStream

        public InputStream getUserServiceFileInputStream()
        Returns an input stream of the contents of the per-user service file. Returns null if the file doesn't exist or if there's an error creating the input stream.

      • getConfigSysconfdirServiceFileInputStream

        public InputStream getConfigSysconfdirServiceFileInputStream()
        Returns the input stream of the contents of the service file in the sysconfdir specified by pg_config. Returns null if there's an error calling pg_config, or the service file doesn't exist, or if there's an error creating the input stream.
        Specified by:
        getConfigSysconfdirServiceFileInputStream in interface Context
        Overrides:
        getConfigSysconfdirServiceFileInputStream in class BaseContext
        Returns:
        the input stream of the service file contents, or null

      • getConfigSysconfdirServiceFilename

        public String getConfigSysconfdirServiceFilename()
        Returns the input stream of the contents of the service file in the sysconfdir specified by pg_config. If the input stream can't be created for any reason (such as pg_config isn't found, or the file doesn't exist) null is returned.
        Specified by:
        getConfigSysconfdirServiceFilename in interface Context
        Overrides:
        getConfigSysconfdirServiceFilename in class BaseContext
        Returns:
        the service file input stream

      • getUserPassfileInputStream

        public InputStream getUserPassfileInputStream()
        Returns the input stream of the contents of the per-user passfile. Returns null if the file doesn't exist or if there's an error creating the input stream.
        Returns:
        the input stream of the contents of the passfile, or null

      • getConfigSysconfdir

        public static String getConfigSysconfdir()
        Returns the value of the sysconfdir provided by the pg_config tool. This is a best-effort attempt to replicate the behavior of libpq, where there's value of sysconfdir compiled in. Returns null if there's an error calling pg_config.
        Returns:
        the sysconfdir path, or null
